parameters.description: Amount of inventory items per page to request

parameters.description: Whether the inventory is digital or not

parameters.description: Comma separated inventory ids to filter by

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description:
Sort will default to ascending order for each field. 
To sort in descending order please pass a "-" in front of the field name. 
For example, Sort=-onHand,name will sort by onHand descending

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description:
Search is available for 2 fields, Inventory ID and Name -
1. Expected behavior for search by Inventory ID is exact match
2. Expected behavior for search by Inventory Name is partial match, i.e. does not have to be start of word, 
but must be consecutive characters. This is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: LocationType
parameters.description:
LocationType is valid for hub, spoke, or lts.
LocationType will default to all locations.

post.description: This endpoint will provide, where possible, an estimate of pricing and fulfillment center assignment of a potential standard (direct to consumer) order. Keep in mind that there are ways for the merchant to change FC assignment or product configuration after order creation that could invalidate this estimate. Estimates cannot be returned for items that are unknown, out of stock, or too large for fulfillment using standard box sizes. Additional services such as high-pick fees, shipping insurance, auto-splitting or auto-adding items to orders, and signature required are not included in this estimate.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page of products to get - Valid Range is 0 to integer max with a default of 1

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Amount of products per page to request - Valid Range is 1 to 250 with a default of 50

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of product ids to filter by

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description:
Search is available for 2 fields of the inventory record related to the product: Inventory ID and Name -
1. Expected behavior for search by Inventory ID is exact match
2. Expected behavior for search by Inventory Name is partial match, i.e. does not have to be start of word, 
but must be consecutive characters. This is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: ActiveStatus
parameters.description:
Status filter for products:
- Any: Include both active and inactive
- Active: Filter products that are Active
- Inactive: Filter products that are Inactive",

parameters.name: BundleStatus
parameters.description:
Bundle filter for products:
- Any: Don't filter and consider products that are bundles or not bundles
- Bundle: Filter by products that are bundles
- NotBundle: Filter by products that are not bundles"

Inventory.DimensionViewModel.description: Information about an inventory item's dimensions

depth.description: Depth in inches of this inventory item

length.description: Length in inches of this inventory item

weight.description: Weight in ounces of this inventory item

width.description: Width in inches of this inventory item

Inventory.FulfillmentCenterQuantityViewM.description: Break down of fulfillable quantity by fulfillment center

awaiting_quantity.description: Amount of quantity awaiting arrival of a receiving order at this fulfillment center

committed_quantity.description: Amount of committed quantity at this fulfillment center

fulfillable_quantity.description: Amount of fulfillable quantity at this fulfillment center

id.description: Unique id of the fulfillment center

internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The quantity of items that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers, with a destination of this fulfillment center.
These items are not pickable or fulfillable until they have been received and moved 
to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.

onhand_quantity.description: Amount of onhand quantity at this fulfillment center

fulfillable_quantity_by_fulfillment_cent.description: Fulfillable quantity of this inventory item broken down by fulfillment center location

fulfillable_quantity_by_lot.description: Fulfillable quantity of this inventory item broken down by lot

id.description: Unique id of the inventory item

is_active.description: Whether the inventory is active or not

is_case_pick.description: True if the inventory item is marked as case pick

is_digital.description: True if the inventory item is marked as a digital item

is_lot.description: True if this inventory item is organized into lots

total_awaiting_quantity.description: Total quantity in unreceived receiving orders for this inventory item

total_backordered_quantity.description:
The amount of the item you need to send to ShipBob to fulfill all exception orders containing 
the item. This is the exception_quantity less the fulfillable_quantity of the item.

total_committed_quantity.description: Total committed quantity of this inventory item

total_exception_quantity.description:
The total quantity of all items that are contained within orders that
are in exception/out of stock status. Out of stock orders have not been
processed and therefore do not have lot or fulfillment centers assigned.

total_fulfillable_quantity.description: Total fulfillable quantity of this inventory item

total_internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The total quantity of all items that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers. These items are not pickable or fulfillable
until they have been received and moved to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.
Internal transit quantities for each FC represent the incoming transfer stock
for that specific location.

total_onhand_quantity.description: Total onhand quantity of this inventory item

total_sellable_quantity.description:
Total quantity that can be sold without overselling the inventory item.
This is calculated by subtracting the total exception quantity from the
fulfillable quantity.

Inventory.LotQuantityViewModel.description: Break down of fulfillable quantity by lot

awaiting_quantity.description: Quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot awaiting arrival of a receiving order

committed_quantity.description: Committed quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

fulfillable_quantity.description: Fulfillable quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

fulfillable_quantity_by_fulfillment_cent.description: Fulfillable quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot broken down by fulfillment center location

internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The quantity of all items belonging to this lot that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers. These items are not pickable or fulfillable
until they have been received and moved to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.
Internal transit quantities for each FC represent the incoming transfer stock
for that specific location.

onhand_quantity.description: OnHand quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

Locations.AddressViewModel.description: The service-specific address of the location. Each object contains address type, address1, address2, city, state, country, zip code, phone number, and email

address1.description: First part of the address of the location for this service

address2.description: Second part of the address of the location for this service

email.description: Email of the location for this service

name.description: Name to use in the address of the location for this service

phone_number.description: Phone Number of the location for this service

id.description: Unique Id for the fulfillment center attribute
Unique Id for the fulfillment center type
Unique Id for the location region

name.description: Name of the region the location is in.

abbreviation.description: Abbreviation of the location. Combination of nearest Airport Code and the sequence number.

access_granted.description: Indicates whether or not the user is authorized to interact at all with the location

id.description: Id of the location in ShipBobs database

is_active.description: Indicates if the location is operationally active or inactive

is_receiving_enabled.description: Indicates if the receiving is enabled for FC

is_shipping_enabled.description: Indicates if the shipping is enabled for FC

name.description:
Name of the location. Follows the naming convention City (State Code)
for domestic FCs and City (Country Code) for international FCs

enabled.description: Indicates if the user is authorized to access this service at the location

id.description: Unique Id for the fulfillment center

external_line_id.description: Numeric assignment per item. Used as a reference number for multiple purposes such as split orders, split containers, etc.

id.description: Unique id of the product

quantity.description: The quantity of this product ordered

quantity_unit_of_measure_code.description: Defined standard for measure for an item (each, inner pack, case, pallet).  Values: EA, INP, CS and PL

external_line_id.description: Numeric assignment per item. Used as a reference number for multiple purposes such as split orders, split containers, etc.

gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number - unique and internationally recognized identifier assigned to item by company GS1

name.description: Name of the product. Required if there is not an existing ShipBob product with a matching reference_id value.

quantity.description: The quantity of this product ordered

quantity_unit_of_measure_code.description: Defined standard for measure for an item (each, inner pack, case, pallet).  Values: EA, INP, CS and PL

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product

upc.description: Universal Product Code - Unique external identifier

country.description: The country (Must be ISO Alpha-2 for estimates)

canceled_shipment_results.description: Results of canceling the shipments associated with the order

order_id.description: The ID of the canceled order

is_success.description: If the cancel action was successful

results.description: The results of all cancellation actions

products.description: List of what is packed in this carton

carton_details.description: Details about the contents of this carton

id.description: ID assigned to this carton
Unique id of the channel

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the order

location_id.description: Desired Fulfillment Center Location ID. If not specified, ShipBob will determine the location that fulfills this order.

order_number.description: User friendly orderId or store order number that will be shown on the Orders Page. If not provided, referenceId will be used

products.description: Products included in the order. Products identified by reference_id must also include the product name if there is no matching ShipBob product.

purchase_date.description: Date this order was purchase by the end user

reference_id.description: Unique and immutable order identifier from your upstream system

shipping_method.description: Client-defined shipping method matching what the user has listed as the shipping method on the Ship Option Mapping setup page in the ShipBob Merchant Portal. If they dont match, we will create a new one and default it to Standard

tags.description: Key value pair array to store extra information at the order level for API purposes. ShipBob won't display the info in the ShipBob Merchant Portal or react based on this data.

estimated_price.description: Estimated price in dollars for the provided shipping method

shipping_method.description: Provided shipping method. Maps to ship option in ShipBob.

total_weight_oz.description: Total weight of items in cart including packaging.

products.description: Products to be included in the order. Each product must include one of reference_id or id

shipping_methods.description:
Array of strings specifying shipping methods for which to fetch estimates.

If this field is omitted we will return estimates for all shipping methods defined in ShipBob

id.description: Unique id of the product (Must be provided if reference_id is unknown)

quantity.description: The quantity of this product ordered

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product (Must be provided if ID is unknown)

estimates.description: Array of estimates for each shipping method

company_name.description: Name of the company receiving the shipment

country.description: The country (Must be ISO Alpha-2 for estimates)

zip_code.description: The zip code or postal code

total_price.description: Sum of all line item prices, discounts, and taxes in USD
Sum of all line item prices, discounts, and taxes in USD

addresses.description:
Ship From - Certain retailers want to display the ship from address as their return facility, not Shipbobs warehouse address        /// 
Mark For Address - Final destination address

doNotShipBeforeDate.description: The date the retailer does not want the order shipped by.

purchase_order_number.description: First initial documentation sent from buyer to seller with item(s) and quantities.

shipByDate.description: The date the retailer has requested the order to ship by.

id.description: Unique id for the service level

name.description: The name or title of the service level

active.description: Indicates if the shipping method is active

default.description: Indicates the shipping method is a ShipBob default shipping method.

id.description: Unique id for shipping method.

name.description: Name of the ship method as selected by the merchant and saved in ShipBobs database (i.e. ground). Corresponds to the shipping_method field in the Orders API.

log_type_id.description: Log type id of the shipment

Orders.ShipmentProductViewModel.description: Information about a store product belonging to a shipment

id.description: Unique id of the product

inventory_items.description: Information about fulfillable inventory items belonging to this product

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product

sku.description: Stock keeping unit for the product

actual_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs completion of the fulfillment operation as promised.
Currently, this means the shipment has been picked, packed, and label has been printed.

delivery_date.description: The datetime of Shipment delivered to customer.

estimated_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs commitment for completing
the shipment and handing to the carrier for delivery.

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the shipment

id.description: Unique id of the shipment

insurance_value.description: Monetary amount that this shipment was insured for

invoice_amount.description: Monetary amount that was invoiced for this shipment

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.

last_tracking_update_at.description: Timestamp for the last time this shipment had a tracking update

last_update_at.description: Date this shipment was last updated

order_id.description: Id of the order this shipment belongs to

products.description: Information about the products contained in this shipment

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique id of the order this shipment belongs to

ship_option.description: Name of the shipping option used for this shipment

status_details.description: Additional details about the shipment status

id.description: The id of the status detail

name.description: Short name of the status detail

bol.description: Bill of lading (BOL) number. Document acknowledging receipt of cargo for shipment.

carrier_service.description: The carrier's service which was used for this shipment

pro_number.description: Tracking number used for freight carriers

scac.description: Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC). Unique 2-4 letter code used to identify transportation companies.

tracking_url.description: URL to the website where a shipment can be tracked

Receiving.AssignOrderToFulfillmentCenter.description:
Model containing information that assigns a receiving order to a fulfillment center.
If the fulfillment center provided is in a receiving hub region, then the response will be the receiving hub location.

id.description: ID of the fulfillment center to assign this receiving order to
